description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Merger is an unique and addictive puzzle game for all ages. The game comes packed with 60 pre-made levels in increasing difficulty to prepare you for Endless Mode where the real challenge is.  In Endless Mode you will be faced with random generated levels that you need to finish before the timer runs out.
